name: HEARTH (FedeJo)
description:
We think there is not enough awareness of our impact on Earth and what we risk losing due to our decisions. We offer you an emotional story with a minimal graphic style. Put yourself in the shoes of an ordinary guy, living in the next future, in a graphic adventure game. All of this is available from your PC. You can make a difference. Discover your impact. HOW TO PLAY

You only need your keyboard. 

We suggest you play with headphones for a better experience and try reaching different endings.

Known bugs

Some bugs could appear. If this happens, you can press the R key to reload the last scene. Most important are the following:

  • when you go on with enter key too fast during dialogues, there could be errors. We suggest you use space if you play without reading (for example if you want to skip dialogues to try another ending)
  • in the first scene could happen that your character moves along the z-axis (you can notice this because a green line appears at the bottom, under the street). In this case, press the R key
  • there is a scene where your character is running. If you fail the QTE while an animation is not completed yet, your character or an NPC could restart the run wrongly. Sometimes this error solves itself, but you can reload (R key) if you prefer
  • recommended resolution is 1920x1080
